wikipedia_page.main: Alan John Forey (born 1933) is reader emeritus in history at the University of Durham and an authority on the history of the military orders of the middle ages. In 1994, his work was collected and published in the Variorum Collected Studies series as Military Orders and Crusades.

response: *The Military Orders from the Twelfth to the Early Fourteenth Centuries. Alan Forey, 1991.
